软件包 cn.org.rapid_framework.generator.util.sqlerrorcode

用于SQLException.errorCode,SQLState等错误码的判断,该代码主要逻辑从spring copy过来

请参见：
          描述

类摘要
SQLErrorCodes JavaBean for holding JDBC error codes for a particular database.
SQLErrorCodesFactory Factory for creating SQLErrorCodes based on the "databaseProductName" taken from the DatabaseMetaData.
SQLErrorCodeSQLExceptionTranslator Implementation of SQLExceptionTranslator that analyzes vendor-specific error codes.
 

软件包 cn.org.rapid_framework.generator.util.sqlerrorcode 的描述

用于SQLException.errorCode,SQLState等错误码的判断,该代码主要逻辑从spring copy过来
